== Virje (602604) ==
      
Virje is a village in the [[Karwar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 2080.26 hectares and harbouring 2076 households with total population of 7058 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KARWAR]] is at a distance of 46 km. Male population is 3638 and female population is 3420. Scheduled Caste Population is 833 and Scheduled Tribes population is 180. Census Location Code of the village is 602604<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
